head.title: File:Blinn Vectors.svg - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

body.class: mediawiki ltr sitedir-ltr ns-6 ns-subject page-File_Blinn_Vectors_svg skin-vector action-view vector-animateLayout

div.div: Size of this preview: 800 × 545 pixels. Other resolutions: 320 × 218 pixels | 640 × 436 pixels | 1,100 × 750 pixels.
Original file ‎(SVG file, nominally 1,100 × 750 pixels, file size: 15 KB)

td.div:
This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

td.div:
English: A diagram showing the vectors used in calculating Blinn-Phong lighting, relative to a surface point:
N, the surface normal
L, normalized vector in direction of light source
R, normalized vector in direction of specular light reflection
V, normalized vector in direction of viewer
H, the "halfway" vector, a normalized vector in direction of (V+L)/2
Image originally created by User:Fuzzypeg in Inkscape and modified by User:Martin Kraus; released to the public domain.

table.style: clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f0f0f0; border:2px solid #e0e0e0; direction: ltr;
